beers.description: Our bright and beautiful fresh orange juice pale ale.
beers.summary: Our bright and beautiful fresh orange juice pale ale.

beers.notes: Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, juicy fruit, and earth.
beers.description: Our Four-Grain Saison. 4.8% Batch #18. Brewed with rye, oats, wheat and Cascade hops. This is our most accurate interpretation of traditional Saison.
beers.summary:
Our Four-Grain Saison. 4.8% Batch #18. Brewed with rye, oats, wheat and Cascade hops. This is our most accurate interpretation of traditional Saison.
Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, juicy fruit, and earth.

beers.notes: Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.
beers.description: Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable.
beers.summary:
Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable.
Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.

beers.notes: Notes of grapefruit zest, orange oil, pine tar, and a snappy earthiness.
beers.description: Rye Double IPA 8.8% Brewed with heaps of flaked rye. Hopped in the kettle with the almighty Simcoe. Then aggressively dry hopped with Equinox and Citra. Pungent and nostalgic.
beers.summary:
Rye Double IPA 8.8% Brewed with heaps of flaked rye. Hopped in the kettle with the almighty Simcoe. Then aggressively dry hopped with Equinox and Citra. Pungent and nostalgic.
Notes of grapefruit zest, orange oil, pine tar, and a snappy earthiness.

beers.notes: Notes of meyer lemon zest, pizza crust, delicate perfume, and orange blossom.
beers.description: Super Kvass. 4.7% Brewed with 60 pounds of house made rye caraway bread, Pilsner malt and 6 row barley. Gently hopped with Saaz and Lemondrop. Fermented with a sourdough culture that our Baker, Jean-Luc, wrangled and our Magickal saison yeast.
beers.summary:
Super Kvass. 4.7% Brewed with 60 pounds of house made rye caraway bread, Pilsner malt and 6 row barley. Gently hopped with Saaz and Lemondrop. Fermented with a sourdough culture that our Baker, Jean-Luc, wrangled and our Magickal saison yeast.
Notes of meyer lemon zest, pizza crust, delicate perfume, and orange blossom.

beers.notes: Notes of ripe passion fruit, tropical parfait, wet ferns, and guava hard candies.
beers.description: Jasmine Rice IPA. 5.0% Brewed with jasmine rice and fluffy oats. Assertively hopped in the kettle with Mosaic and Simcoe, then thoughtfully dry hoppped with Wakatu, Moasic and Simcoe.
beers.summary:
Jasmine Rice IPA. 5.0% Brewed with jasmine rice and fluffy oats. Assertively hopped in the kettle with Mosaic and Simcoe, then thoughtfully dry hoppped with Wakatu, Moasic and Simcoe.
Notes of ripe passion fruit, tropical parfait, wet ferns, and guava hard candies.

beers.notes: Notes of key lime custard, over ripe raspberry, sun drenched weed fields, and drippy papaya.
beers.description: Kolsch IPA 6.0%. Brewed with an enormous amount of fluffy oats. Aggressively hopped in the kettle with Mosaic and lime juice. Fermented with our favorite Kolsch strain in stainless. Then dry hopped with Amarillo and a touch of Zythos.
beers.summary:
Kolsch IPA 6.0%. Brewed with an enormous amount of fluffy oats. Aggressively hopped in the kettle with Mosaic and lime juice. Fermented with our favorite Kolsch strain in stainless. Then dry hopped with Amarillo and a touch of Zythos.
Notes of key lime custard, over ripe raspberry, sun drenched weed fields, and drippy papaya.

beers.notes: Notes of mandarinquat, white cranberry, raspberry leaf, and black currant preserves
beers.description: Sea Buckthorn Saison. 4.8% Brewed with pilsner malt, raw wheat, and toasted buckwheat. Assertively hopped in the kettle with Wakatu and copious amounts of Sea Buckthorn powder. Then conditioned on luscious passion fruit puree.
beers.summary:
Sea Buckthorn Saison. 4.8% Brewed with pilsner malt, raw wheat, and toasted buckwheat. Assertively hopped in the kettle with Wakatu and copious amounts of Sea Buckthorn powder. Then conditioned on luscious passion fruit puree.
Notes of mandarinquat, white cranberry, raspberry leaf, and black currant preserves

beers.notes: Notes of watermelon rind, wildflower bouquet, oyster crackers, and carefree bumble bees.
beers.description: Truly Wild Ale. 4.2% Brewed entirely with Pilsner malt. Gently hopped in the kettle with a handful Saaz and over one pound per barrel of bee pollen. Fermented and conditioned in our open top puncheons atop heaps of raw honey from Fruitwood Orchards with a wild yeast culture grown in our lab at our Dispensary from the same honey.
beers.summary:
Truly Wild Ale. 4.2% Brewed entirely with Pilsner malt. Gently hopped in the kettle with a handful Saaz and over one pound per barrel of bee pollen. Fermented and conditioned in our open top puncheons atop heaps of raw honey from Fruitwood Orchards with a wild yeast culture grown in our lab at our Dispensary from the same honey.
 Notes of watermelon rind, wildflower bouquet, oyster crackers, and carefree bumble bees.
